about_the_game:
Music by: NecropolisAD

Craft your perfect Defense by leveling up your Heroes and creating powerful Skill synergies. Use Items to further support their Skills and counter enemy mechanics.

Demo Features

  • 2 Maps each requiring different strategies to complete. The first map acts as an introduction to the game while the second map will challenge you in multiple ways.

  • ~40 different Abilities spread over four Skilltrees. Unlock them as you level up your Tangys and spend skillpoints. More Abilities will be added over time.

  • Defeat different types of enemies as you progress through the levels. They all require different strategies to take down and more will be added over time.

  • The Demo features one Boss, and more will be added over time.

  • Currently there are four different types of Heroes:

    • A Defender that focuses on melee combat with low range but high defense in addition to utilities to buff/protect the other Tangys from harm.

    • The Healer heals your damaged Units, but can also deal some serious Lightning Damage if need be.

    • A Ranger that can pick off stragglers because of their high range and attack speed. Rangers can specialize in almost all different Damage Types: Poison, Fire, Cold and Physical. This makes the Ranger a very versatile class.

    • The Mage specializes in Area Damage using primarily Fire and Ice Abilities. Cold Damage is especially useful in slowing down or even freezing the enemies to hinder them from reaching the Tangy defenses.

Story

Welcome to Tangy TD, the exciting tower defense game that puts you in charge of protecting the realm of Tangerines from waves of invading Undead summoned by an "evil" force! In this deliciously fun game, you'll need to use your strategic skills to place your Hero Tangys along the paths and use a variety of skills and tactics to fight off the invaders and emerge victorious.

In Tangy TD, you'll be able to choose from multiple thrilling missions, each with its own unique challenges and objectives. As you progress through the game, you can level up your Tangys and invest Skillpoints into their Skilltrees. Each Skilltree, will offer a variety of different Abilities and smaller notables to permanently increase the Tangy's power, and give them an edge in combat.

You'll need to be strategic in order to overcome the different enemy types that you'll face in battle. These come in all shapes and sizes, from small and nimble winged creatures to towering behemoths. In addition to their skills and abilities, you can also use advanced targeting and supportive buffs/abilities to create an MMO Raid like experience. Because in Tangy TD, the enemies fight back!

With its fun and unique tangy-themed world, exciting missions, and strategic gameplay, Tangy TD is a game that's sure to satisfy your craving for thrilling tower defense action. Don't wait - download Tangy TD today and start defending your realm!

name: Tangy TD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: At least Windows 7
  • Processor: 64 Bit Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with OpenGL 4.5 support, 256 MB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64 Bit Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with OpenGL 4.5 support, 256 MB

short_description: Get ready to Level up, train Skills, craft Items and build your perfect team to counter smart hordes of enemies. In this 2D Tower Defense game your Skills will be tested to the Limit!
